raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Hair Extensions:** Strong inclination towards hair extensions, specifically **tape-in** and **wavy/curly** types.
- **Material Preference:** Consistently seeks **human hair** products, valuing naturalness in extensions.
- **Length:** Regular preference for **18 inches**, indicating a desire for longer styles.
- **Quality Concerns:** Frequent dissatisfaction with product **quality** and **durability**; multiple low ratings suggest **thinness**, **shedding**, and poor **adhesion** as major issues.
- **Brands:** Encountering variable experiences across different brands, with notable frustration leading to brand-switching behavior when quality fails.
- **Installation Type:** Primarily gravitates toward **tape** and **weave** installations, yet experiences challenges with **tape longevity** and ease of maintenance.
- **Customer Experience:** A trend of expecting more from products, leading to **negative reviews** for performance failure, particularly after washing or styling.
- **Preferred Styles:** Queries into **curly** and **wavy** textures, hinting at a desire for versatility in hairstyles, despite expressing disappointment in texture retention and appearance post-use. 

Overall, the individual appears to prioritize style and material but has encountered significant quality issues, affecting their overall satisfaction.

target_interaction.title: Terrible
target_interaction.text: Did not even come apart right and slipped when trying to braid. Terrible quality.
target_interaction.title_meta: LingGuan 32 Inch Ocean Wave Crochet Hair 6 Packs Ripple Deep Wave Braiding Hair Pre-Feathered King Tips Body Wave Braids Synthetic Hair Extensions for Black Women (32inch-6Packs, 1B30)
features: Styles: Ocean Wave Crochet Hair Braids 32 Inches Deep Ripple Crochet Synthetic Braids Hair Extensions Pre-stretched braiding hair body wave
Hair Length: 32inch Deep Wave Crochet Hair.Package: 6 Packs/Lot, 100g/pack.usually need 4-6 packs for full a head.

Hair Features: Ocean wave crochet braid synthetic hair is Smooth, Soft, Durable and Natural Texture, Light -Comfortable to Wear.Looped Easy and Fast Styling: Seals quickly and easily Install.Does Not being Fade, Easy to Crochet, Braid and Twist, Can Restyle It as You Like.

Time Saving: 100 percent Handmade Crochet Braids. Our deep wave crochet hair are handmade (not manufactured), it is super easy to install. Especially for beginners, you can show your personality and charming effortlessly.
Hair Material: Ocean Wave Crochet Braids Hair Extensions Made from 100 percent Japanese Heat-resisting Kanekalon heat resistant synthetic fiber,Natural looking,feels very much like human hair.
description: 32 Inch Deep Wave Crochet Hair Deep Ocean Wave Crochet Braids Pre-Feathered Synthetic Hair Extensions Hair Material: Made of 100percent high quality low temperature hot water setting synthetic fiber.Package: 6 Packs/Lot, 100g/pack.Hair Length: 32 Inch Deep Wave Crochet Hair.Color: 4 colors to choose from 1B,4#,T1B/27, T1B/30.Hair Advantages: Smooth, Soft, Lightweight, No shedding, Natural Texture, Luster, Comfortable to Wear. Our Ripple Deep Wave Crochet Hair is well taken care of because it is Tangle-Free and Long-lasting.How to Crochet Style Braid your hair into individual french braids.After completing the individual french braids, slide the latch hook underneath the braid.After inserting hair, close the latch and slide the hair back underneath the braid.Take two fingers to open at the loop and feed the end of the hair through the hole.Pull the hair up and make tight onto braid to secure your knot. Keep the knots next to one another and repeat these steps until you reach your desire volume. TIPS: Non-Flammable Washing Instruction Fill a basin with cool or luck warm water. Add a dash ,of mild shampoo and swish gently. Shake out, do not brush when wet and drip dry. Rinse thoroughly in cold water. Do not use curling iron or curling kits. No setting is necessary, curls will snap back into position when hair I completely dry.
